name: 2018 Italian General Election- reset
pattern: (?: renzi | salvini | di[[:space:]]+maio | forza[[:space:]]+italia | meloni | liberi[[:space:]]+e[[:space:]]+uguali | emma[[:space:]]+bonino | beppe[[:space:]]+grillo | movimento[[:space:]]+5[[:space:]]+stelle | m5s | partito[[:space:]]+democratico | gentiloni | lega[[:space:]]+nord | berlusconi | fratelli[[:space:]]+d\'italia | boldrini | fratoianni | pietro[[:space:]]+grasso | roberto[[:space:]]+speranza | \+europa | lorenzin | liberi[[:space:]]+e[[:space:]]+uguali | leu )
solr_seed_query: (Renzi OR Salvini OR "Di Maio" OR "Forza Italia" OR Meloni OR "Liberi e Uguali" OR "Emma Bonino" OR "Beppe Grillo" OR "Movimento 5 Stelle" OR M5S OR "Partito Democratico" OR Gentiloni OR "Lega Nord" OR Berlusconi OR "Fratelli d'Italia" OR Boldrini OR Fratoianni OR "Pietro Grasso" OR "Roberto Speranza" OR "+Europa" OR Lorenzin OR "Liberi e Uguali" OR "Leu") AND language:it
